html:
9.20.20  2:26 pm   tuning my piano costs too much so would shaving it be an effective alternative?

      no

9.20.20  12:50 pm   What would you like to be besides a musician?

      film director, or whatever the modern day equivalent may be

9.20.20  12:48 pm   what's the first letter of the second word of the title of your new song?

      c

9.20.20  12:44 pm   could sexy pants have been about a music stand

      it could have been, except i was writing in a desk cubicle. so my conclusion is that it's about a desk. this is only the first 2 or 3 lines. most of the rest of the song was written about 8 years later, and at that point the song is about what most of my songs are about, which is the whole world. at least it's supposed to be

9.20.20  12:29 pm   Ahhhhhhhh, Bill, what question will you answer in your next video?

      "is it really over". and i should clarify that the significance of this line is extremely low, outside of the context of the scenario. it plays a very similar role to the 'oatmeal' line in airport terminal. at a certain point about 2/3 of the way through the song, the song seems to ask itself if it's over, and the answer seems to be no, the song is not over at that time. i hope that makes sense

9.20.20  12:09 pm   How do I not be cool

      how about destroying the universe

9.20.20  12:01 pm   whats the name of your new song :)))

      i can't tell you

9.20.20  11:55 am   Why did the chicken cross the road?

      what my client (the chicken) and i are wondering is why was a road built across the chicken's path

9.20.20  11:17 am   do you know when you will release your next video/song?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.20.20  11:01 am   Are you learning 3D Animation?

      i don't see why not

9.20.20  10:55 am   do you like music?

      it's ok

9.20.20  10:54 am   so keyboards are good for making music but i don't have one but i have used a couple different ones online using my computer keyboard, any reccommendations

      the biggest problem with using computer keyboards as music performance devices is they actually can't tell how loud or soft you pressed the note

9.20.20  10:42 am   When the countdown timer reaches 0, will you return to posting content on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube again?

     yes

      Also, do you know what your new production schedule will be yet? (example: 1 song every 2 weeks)

     if it's anything less then that, i would be extremely sad. but due to some sort of brainular problem i have, i seem to have trouble moving mountains in that amount of time. And why do i need to move mountains in order to make a song? well i suppose that would be due to some brainular problem i have. so i have a religious daily mantra where i remind myself to make sure i move very very small mountains instead of big ones, but then when the experts arrive they usually determine that those mountains which i thought were small are in fact very large. which leads me to my next point which is that i apparently have difficulty judging size correctly, which is perhaps due to some brainular problem i have

9.20.20  10:30 am   Are your lyrics intentionally vague to allow the listener to come up with their own interpretations?

      i always assumed that was in the songwriter's best practices handbook. although i prefer to call it 'strong' not 'vague'. Also, you need to make up for this occasionally by adding excrutiating amounts of detail sometimes, to balance it out

9.20.20  10:07 am   Have you ever thought of premiering your next video? I think that would be cool with alot of hype surrounding it.

      from a viewer standpoint, i don't like the premiere feature because you are not allowed to watch from the beginning, or pause, until the first playthrough is over. this is inconvenient for viewers like me because those are 2 of my favorite things to do with a video

9.20.20  9:49 am   Hey Bill, what do you do when you know your song needs a melody but the rest of your brain insists that it does not need one?

      pretty much all my songs need melodies, otherwise i might put it in a different category (moodpiece?) but from what you have told me so far i would guess that yours does not need a melody

9.20.20  9:26 am   are rectangles circles

      with the right mindset

9.20.20  9:21 am   when do you think the next video will come out?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.20.20  8:43 am   What was the inspiration for writing a song about Mount. St. Helens?

      seeing it in a hotel bathroom painting, after already seeing it from the plane on the way over

9.20.20  8:29 am   did you post the "might quit" video on purpose as your "last" one for a while?

     absolutely not

     (i saw signs of a new video on here but i havent found anything actually confirming that)

9.20.20  8:25 am   Are you studying 3D animations

     only under close surveillance by the SIMPLICITY POLICE

     BTW big fan of yours

9.20.20  8:17 am   Bill, why does the D minor piano scale have to ruin my life?

      because it's pretty much all white keys (almost) and it's very difficult to play when it's all white keys, at least without looking

9.20.20  8:03 am   Do you like grapes

      only in multiples of 3

9.20.20  7:44 am   Have you been enlightened my dude?

      some what, but it's a percentage system and there is infinite potential for enlightenment so i am still unfortunately at 0 percent, despite incurring thus far quite a great deal of enlightenment

9.20.20  6:30 am   Have you ever thought about how cool it would sound if every single chord was tuned in perfect JI? Instead of just tuning every note of the scale once and then running into temperment issues when, for example, moving from the tonic to any other chord in a given key, you would adjust the tuning for every single chord in post? I usually think about this for a second and then immediately think of how stupidly tedious it would be to actually accomplish this. Interesting to think about, though, don't you think?

      yes
9.20.20  6:14 am   what's your favorite unicode/keyboard character?

9.20.20  5:37 am   Is the number 240 that you have on your wall in your room (or the room you film yourself playing in), is it kind of parody to 420?

     yes

      Or else, what is the meaning behind it?

9.20.20  5:22 am   is it true that you don't have drums?

      absolutely not

9.20.20  5:01 am   are you making a video soon?

      doing it now

9.20.20  3:53 am   How did you got the idea of making these psychedelic animations?

      just trying to get by

9.20.20  2:44 am   What are your thoughts on cubes?

      i hate them but according to my therapist i love them and i should use them for everything

9.20.20  2:15 am   Why do guitars have to hurt so much to play? I just wanna be like every other midwesterner but instead i have the tips of my fingers feeling like they've been stabbed 22 times individually. Is coolness only achieved through bloody fingers?

      i think you are supposed to stop just before they bleed, then do it again the next day. if you continue like this soon you will have fingers made of hard plastic, which will be perfect

9.20.20  12:06 am   If we survive the nifty combo of deadly pandemic and evil societal takeover, could you please make a video about different types of art and science, so they can be remembered and taught/learned again? 

      sure

9.19.20  11:55 pm   have you ever written a written story?

      sort of

9.19.20  11:33 pm   Hello Bill I was wondering who long it takes to edit a normal music video of yours? 

      what the heck is a normal music video

9.19.20  11:19 pm   should i make a song?

      sure

9.19.20  10:45 pm   Where did you learn how to play all of your Instruments

      at home, and in the work place

9.19.20  10:24 pm   any hints on what your next video will be?

      yes

9.19.20  9:03 pm   Is life a simulation?

      of what

9.19.20  8:32 pm   how much did you have to learn music?

      until i feel complete

9.19.20  8:23 pm   When shall you release your next song/video?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.19.20  8:14 pm   What inspires you when making music?

      literally everything

9.19.20  6:54 pm   Do you plan on releasing an album at some point?

      i prefer to release songs 1 at a time

9.19.20  4:44 pm   in the scenario that you lived forever and at some point had made every possible song or music genre to ever exist what would you do next

      maybe some fanfiction

9.19.20  4:34 pm   Are the type of videos changing?

     yes

      Will the videos make me think I'm on LSD?

     i doubt it

     Are they just going to look a bit better/3D I am very confushjskrhefed pls halp

      they will look 3D but they're going to look worse

9.19.20  4:34 pm   How do u mak videos

      we'll see

9.19.20  3:53 pm   Why you don't upload new songs?

      that's a trick question. i do

9.19.20  3:27 pm   What can I do to pass the time?

      literally anything

9.19.20  3:08 pm   quantum physics (namely the double slit experiment) gives me existential anxiety. The idea of God and a divine plan gives me more comfort than a multiverse and existence being "powered" soley off probability. I don't know how to take this. How should I go about my fear of science?  

      i thought it was actually the quantum uncertainty that pretty much allows for the entire emotional/conscious nature of our world. the 2 things you mentioned actually seem to support each other, not contradict

9.19.20  2:17 pm   do you hate the word moist

      i am desensitized to it, from over exposure
